summary: This document is a summary of a call with Gary Steil regarding PCS (Professional Computer Systems) and its custodian, Paul Kane. It notes Kane's role in responding to a subpoena and the electronic conversion of records. The document is subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Gary Steil
persons.context: Person with whom the call was held regarding PCS and its records custodian.

persons.name: Paul Kane
persons.role: Director of Finance at PCS, records custodian
persons.context: The Director of Finance at PCS who responded to a subpoena and provided documents from the company's electronic system, though he was not there when the original documents were created.

connections.description: Kane is the subject of a call between Steil and the document's author regarding PCS records and subpoena response.

events.title: Call regarding PCS records custodian
events.description: A call was held with Gary Steil concerning Paul Kane, the Director of Finance at PCS, who served as the records custodian for a subpoena response.

events.title: PCS records converted to electronic format
events.description: PCS converted its records to electronic format approximately ten years prior to 2021.

events.title: Paul Kane joined PCS
events.description: Paul Kane began working at PCS in 2019, after the original documents in question were created.

keyFacts: Paul Kane, Director of Finance at PCS, acted as the records custodian for a subpoena response, retrieving documents from the company's electronic system.
PCS converted its records to electronic format approximately ten years prior to 2021.
Paul Kane was not employed at PCS when the original documents were created, having started in 2019.
The document is subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17).
